text:
Champions League
OL - Benfica: which team for Garcia?
For this new C1 game, Rudi Garcia's men are expected at the turn, after a bitter tasting match.
05 Nov 2019, 08:40 by Thomas Rassouli



It's a nice revenge that the Lyonnais have the opportunity to take tonight, in their stadium. After a 1-2 defeat in the final minutes of the game in Lisbon in the first leg, Anthony Lopes and his team are eager to reap important points to revive the Champions League. Their two victories in the championship announce a good dynamic, and a new victory would best prepare the match against Olympique de Marseille on Sunday.




A 4-4-2 having proved itself




The probable compo of the OL + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Demivol√©e

For this meeting, Rudi Garcia should bet on the eleven who succeeds at Les Gones, in a 4-4-2 having proved his worth. Andersen again associated with Denayer in defense, Dubois and Kon√© occupy the wings, ahead of Lopes in goals. Mendes and Tousart at the recovery, Queen-Adelaide and Aouar would have more freedom on the wings, while the prolific duo Demb√©l√©-Memphis is expected.
